---
title: "R Notebook"
output: PDF
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggprism)
```

```{r}
img_count <- read.csv("../Data/ImagePipeline.csv")
```

```{r}
#versitle flow model
ggplot(data = img_count, aes(x = Manual, y = Versatile_fluo)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm', se = FALSE) +
  theme_prism(base_size = 10) +
  xlab("Manual counts") +
  ylab("Model counts")
```
```{r}
summary(lm(Versatile_fluo ~ Manual, data = img_count))
```
